prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green and red colors, showcasing large, translucent wings.
I want a flying Pokemon that has a unique body shape and a mix of bright colors.
Generate a small insectoid creature with intricate wing patterns and a cheerful personality.
Make a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, featuring bold colors and distinctive traits.
Imagine a forest-dwelling Pokemon with a playful demeanor and striking color combinations.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and showcases a blend of green and red hues.
Show me a small bug Pokemon that has an elegant appearance and a lively character.
